content.detailedDescription: Saw reddish-orange sphere, while walking about 8 pm, hovering with brightness varying slightly in eastern sky. no movement at all. watched it a minute or two, then walked under some trees and saw that it was gone when i saw open sky again.
content.summary: Saw reddish-orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: On 11/2/2013 i was driving home after hunting, shortly after dark.  i turned south onto bellaire ave in white bear lake mn towards the road i live on.  i noticed what kind of looked like street lights that were in a big dipper-like formation, i couldn't exactly tell where they were as i drove down this road but it looked strange to me because they weren't moving or flashing like most objects in the air.  i turned left onto my street, orchard lane, and at this point i could see these objects in the horizon were a ways to the south and not just over bellaire ave.  a group of 6 to 8 objects hovered in formation.  at this point i saw a plane flying to the east from the general direction of the objects.  i felt these may be ufo's as they reminded me of what i have seen in many documentaries.  i drove 2 blocks to my home, grabbed my wife and camera and headed into my back yard to get some pictures and video.  we could only see a portion of the objects and took a few pictures and a little bit of video that did not turn out very well.  the pictures are ok but we didn't use a tripod so they are a little fuzzy.  after 3 minutes the objects started to slowly fade to darkness, not all at the same time.  we drove over to bellaire avenue to see if we could see anything else but everything was gone.
content.summary: A group of 6 to 8 red/orange objects hovered in formation then disappeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
19:45 ... went out back on deck to let dogs in...Extremely bright road flare like glowing red object caught my eye directly overhead...Heading  south south east at airplane like speed...Seemed like very low altitude,beneath lighty scattered clouds...Strangely,no sound at all for the percieved proximity...Had an aura like glow about it,like a road flare..Without the flickering...Disappeared behind builing at about 15 deg azmith on a sraight line course, south south east horizon...Duration... about 10 seconds.

 this was not a flair on a balloon or parachute...It transited to quickly 90 deg to a very light prevaing breeze...No rocking or swinging motion...And the glow was bright and steady ..No flickering at all. 

 if this was a very low flying aircraft...Directly overhead...I would have seen the aircraft itself,it's running and anti collision lights as well... and certainly heard it loud and clear...It seemed that close!
content.summary: glowing red orb

content.detailedDescription:
On a saturday night november 2nd. 2013 at around ten thirty pm, i was on the cell phone talking to a friend, walking outside into our backyard from inside the house, when i barely noticed above me throught the branches of the tress glowing unusual lights.
 (i just checked the time of my call and estimated we had been talking for about 5-10 mins before i walked outside and saw this.)
first i only saw one, then another, and as i walked out from under the tree's blockage of limbs i could clearly see what either seemed like eight seperate shpere or disc shaped vessels in a perfect "v" formation traveling absolutely simultaneous one from another, or one huge "v" shaped vessel with eight lights.
the lights actually seemed to be the craft itself glowing and pulsing in a signalling affect like trying to say something. the lights were changing in color drastically! each light pulsated and changed in the same color as the others as if it were an intellegently controled machine.
i ran ni the house trying to get witnesses. as i ran back out, i heard the neibors laughing and talking loudly, so i ran out to the front and asked them if they saw that. they were all looking in the same area of the clear stary sky and told me that they thought it was lanturns that were lit. we all noticed at least two clear objects floating down to ground gracefully like huge clear trash bags. these objects floating down were to the south of our sighting.
i ran back to the back searching the sky for it/them, and saw nothing but the stars.
content.summary: I barely noticed above me and then in a"v" formation pulsating lights or flying craft either eight seperate or one large "v" shaped vessel traveling west to east clear stary night.

content.detailedDescription: 1.. outside front yard..2... ive had 2 other sighting last 9 days ..I looked to my right saw dis..3....Not a plane..Or jet..To many fly over my house i can tell night or day with or with out a contrailwheatger or not its a plane....4....White disc size of basketball moved to my left made a very hard horseshoe turn left and it dissappeared...5....I actualy feel very calm when i see these objects.. it just vanished gone..What the heck is happening here in ellicott city????...
content.summary: White disc. moving east then very sharp horse shoe turn to left toa westrly direction.

content.detailedDescription: Talking to neighbors, neighbor pointed it out, i did not know until  they told me. it was 8:01 pm. first thought it was the moon, but  it was different. the orb slowly move toward the north with no noise. watched it until i'd was to far away .
content.summary: Round shaped ,looked like designs on it ,slow traveling , took picture of it with i phone

content.detailedDescription:
Opened the door to let the dog outside and noticed several orange orbs in the western sky. these were much larger and brighter than i have very seen so did not think it was a plane. the strange thing about them they were following each others fight paths. flying exactly the same each was a fair distance apart from other. they were a distance away from us so its hard to tell if they made any noise. i would say i say maybe 6 to 9 lights in all. 

here's what i wrote right after the sightings:

saw a series of lights (6-8)red in color they were fairly sizable unlike a plane they did not have flashing lights. they were red glowing lights almost like a glowing balloon in the night. each light followed the first they were at a distance they fly across the sky maybe several minutes. as one crossed another would appear following the same path as the one before it. must have been a total of 6 or 9 lights same size and color that flew across the sky heading in a southern direction. i would say the speed was that of a jet for the distance they covered over that time frame. fairly constant and smooth. 

i called my son out to look so i took my eyes off the sky for several seconds. he witness it and after him called my wife out as well. by this time there were only 2 left in the sky. i wondered where the other lights had gone so i walked out into and down the street away from some trees. at this point could not see any of the other lights so i fixated on the remaining 2 and the one leading as it went southward just vanished. wow, i than looked at the last one in the sky as it followed the others path it also vanished at about the same point where the previous one did. 

i only had my cell phone knowing the camera was not that good i did get a photo of the last orb but all i got was a black sky with a very small dot of light. not sure it even comes close to telling the tale.

i wanted to see if any one else had witnessed the event so i called my local police department. not knowing any where else to call. she listened to my story very curiously and had indicated no one else had call in to say they had witnessed it.
content.summary: Large orange orbs (6 to 9) that flew as fast as a plane following the exact flight path and than disappeared in the sky. they were larger and brighter than any object i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: in huntington wv, i went outside with my son at 11 pm to get my cell phone from my car when we noticed a small orange light moving without sound from left to right (north to northeast) in the sky.  a second orange light appeared approximately one minute afterwards.  the objects seemed to disappear after we lost sight of them due to tree cover.  the sky was cloudless and we had an excellent view of the event.
content.summary: Two orange dots moving slowly, without sound, left to right.

content.detailedDescription: We  were leaving the house when we saw a bright light over the trees. at first we thought a plane crashed but there was no sound or fire. then there was these bright orange orbs that ascended into the sky an traveled in controlled flight about 400 to 500 ft. above the trees. there had to be about at least 100 orange orbs in flight. there was no noise produced by these objects. the experience was quite unnerving. we did capture on video.
content.summary: We saw a bright light that lit up the sky and then the sky was filled with reddish orange orbs that traveled  south to north a few hundred feet above the trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was turning left onto anderson ferry rd from briarhill, to take my daughter to her friend's house. as i was checking both directions to turn, a triangular shaped light formation consisting of 3 yellow/orange orbs caught my attention off in the distance to my right (north). i initially thought it was a plane but quickly realized it was not, based on the fact it was more hovering and floating, than flying quickly in a straight path. i immediately felt drawn to it, compelled to go towards it to see what it was. instead of turning left onto anderson ferry as i had planned, i turned right, towards the object, in an effort to somehow track it down or follow it.I also thought that in doing so, i could prove there was a reasonable explanation for them. in my mind, i was thinking that perhaps they could have been light up paper lanterns or balloons of some type, released for a celebration. as we drove north on anderson ferry, we could easily  see them in front of us, to the n ne, and observed that they were slowing moving in a seemingly random pattern, more like hovering and floating but changing formation, all the while, one orb at a time would randomly flicker off then on. i pulled into a walgreens parking lot so i could sit and view them for a bit from the good vantage point. we stayed for about 1 minute, witnessing the floating behavior, before i pulled out, again trying to travel north in an effort to get closer. as we traveled north on anderson ferry, the rd dipped down a bit, and i lost sight of them, as we could no longer see above the tree line. we turned right onto foley rd and pulled into the church lot there on the corner, so i could take advantage of the clear area to look into the sky and find it once again, but i could no longer spot it. it appeared to either have disappeared, or traveled outside of my view. i did a drive around the church, nearby middle school, and through the local park, checking for any events, celebrations, or sporting events for which they could have released some type of lanterns, balloons, or remote controlled objects, but didn't find anything. that doesn't mean much, as i really couldn't tell how far away or big the objects were.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed 3 glowing orbs, floating and dancing in the sky, blinking intermittently

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on amherst avenue. i look up to the south-west and i saw 3 red zigzag formation of red lights the last fireball dropped
a smaller red object that fell a short ways then went dark.
this happened in butte montana.
content.summary: red zigzag formation

content.detailedDescription:
Was on st rt 8 south in boston heights area ohio  seen thru my drivers window two sets of orange lights spaced apart two by two  as i drove south i kept looking back they were still there in sky ne sky . one of the 4 merged or went onto cloud as it was raining . i never seen anything like if . it was nov 2. 2013 @ 950 pm
i felt overwhelmed as i never believed such things. but was sure what i see was not normal lights . as i've driven that way many nights . i looked back as long as i could they remained as i headed out of sight .
content.summary: Orange lights in sky two sets of two one set joined or merged or went into cloud or here two remained

content.detailedDescription: On 11/02/13 at 13:40 hrs i was standing in a parking lot at 9200 grogans mill rd. admiring the clear skies and watching the regular commercial aircraft and a few personal aircraft flying in the area as i waited to go to work, when i noticed 4 white objects flying at a very high altitude in a diamond formation to the north of my location and moving to the east southeast. i continued to watch the group and it made several pattern changes and i thought it looked wierd maybe some pilots were practicing when another object came out of the north and also moving to the south southeast and basically buzzed the original 4 that were moving at a regular pace. i continued watching the faster moving object until i lost sight of it due to the sun. when i looked back to find the original diamond formation it was gone. i went into work and at approximately 14:20 hrs i came back out and looked again and after a few minutes i saw a v formation of approximately 6 or 7 objects at a very high altitude moving from the west to the east until they faded out of sight. it appeared as the v formation was ascending as the formation disappeared long before the horizon. approximately one minutes after i lost sight of the v formation and object a single at what appeared to tbe the same altitude followed the same path and disappeared into the the blue sky as if it was also ascending.
content.summary: Two groups of ufo's with chaser ufo's

content.detailedDescription: In the back yard sitting in a patio chair.  my wife and i looked up at the same time and noticed it. a glowing orange red sphere. it moved easterly growing in brightness.  i asked my wife to get a pair of binoculars that were sitting just inside the house by the door. i kept my eyes on it looking for blinking lights but there were none. by the time i had the binoculars in hand it had increased to its max brightness.  i was able to get the object in focus and even through the binoculars i could not see any blinking lights.  just a large glowing orange red ball.  i pulled the binoculars from my face and in that short time it was gone.  the entire event was under a cloud layer and well passed sunset.  as a result of the lack of blinking lights it could not have been a conventional aircraft and being late in the evening the angle of the the already set sun rules out a satellite, meaning, the angle of the sun could not have illuminated a satellite that close to the n.E. horizon.  besides, satellites do not fly below earth's cloud cover, and the cloud cover covered the entire eastern sky all the way to the observable horizon.  minutes later two aircraft flew by in normal aircraft patterns for the area and time of night and both had easily observed blinking lights.  we both saw almost the exact same occurance over a year ago in almost the exact same location with the exact same description of oject, color and direction. as well as same behavior.  what are these things?
content.summary: Glowing orange red, moved n.E. gained in brightness then disappeared, duration 20 sec.

content.detailedDescription: A little more than an hour before sunrise this morning i was sitting on a bench in the old city of jerusalem meditating and praying, at a lookout where you can view the western wall, the al aksa mosque and the golden-domed dome of the rock mosque all at the same time. the bench faced north, so the ww and mosques were on my right, and i looked right to view them. suddenly i noticed out of the corner of my eye, almost directly above, in the predawn sky, a distant white light with a very, very slight blueish tinge that was traveling n, away from me, that was getting brighter. as i observed, it seemed to me that it was descending, as if falling. the light got much brighter, somewhat brighter than any of the other stars. then the intensity diminished, and it looked like it was not descending anymore. the time between noticing the object, the growing and then diminishing intensity was not more than 3 seconds. it continued in the same direction n for 2 or 3 more seconds and i lost visual on it. it simply lost intensity to the point it was not viewable. my first thought was that it possibly was a satellite. but i have seen satellites pass from sunlight to darkness, and this did not look like that - plus the object was traveling virtually due n, not east. i thought a satellite should simply maintain a constant brightness if it really was in a northerly orbit. plus i did get the sensation that it descended rather rapidly. i ruled out an airliner, though they do pass over jerusalem and with landing lights on. the object was already past by and traveling away from me when i noticed it, and i have never seen an aircraft with lights as bright as landing lights facing backwards. possibly it was some military aircraft, but again, i've never seen one with lights like that get so bright. perhaps a fireball entering the atmosphere, but it seemed too slow to be one. however there's no way for me to judge the angle of entry so it might have seemed slower than it actually was simply because of the angle. nevertheless, i've seen meteor showers and this did not resemble anything i've seen up to this point. i do not think it was a military flare, since they burn with a slightly reddish tinge as far as i know. (i was a radar technician in a usmc fighter squadron in the '70's, and i've also seen iaf aircraft drop flares.) i also waited around until the sky got bright enough to see that the sky was cloudless - no clouds; i'd thought that possibly a drifting cloud in the dark sky might have occulted a bright star. as far as feelings go, i felt that i'd report it for the sake of making a record in case others might have sighted it. personally i was not overly excited since i have experienced a few of what people might call miracles, and in the 70's experienced about seven episodes of what is called either "sleep paralysis" or "abduction" (but which i think is demonic buffeting).
content.summary: Noticed a light in night sky traveling n suddenly grow bright and then diminish in intensity

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south/west on hilltop drive in redding with my brother riding in the front seat. straight ahead he and i both saw a falling light. at first i thought it must have been a falling star, but it was moving a fraction too slow and the angle wasn't right. we were driving on a ridge and the object appeared to fall into the valley, past our eye level and beyond our line of sight. i don't know if the light burned out or just fell out of sight. the light was constant, not flickering. it looked blue-white to me, but to my brother it looked more amber. from that angle it appeared as the light was falling into the turtle bay area, which the sacramento river runs through. although it could have been falling right into the downtown area of redding. it happened really fast. maybe two or three seconds. it was unlike anything i remember seeing before. we are both very curious as to what it was.
content.summary: Driving south on hilltop dr. in redding, my brother and i saw a light falling slower than a meteorite. not up in the sky, but eye level to the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving down the hills of woodland. i noticed a "triangular" shape of orange glowing lights i had never seen before. looked almost as they were hovering or moving very slowly.  it was over cast outside and raining. recently went dark out.  they were under the clouds, but too high to be electrical power lines. i was just staring at them, until we eventually drove to where we couldn't see them any longer.
content.summary: Orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were sitting in the hot tub in the backyard looking up at the stars just talking. thought at first for a split second that it was a shooting star and as we both realized what we were seeing,it was 3 lights in a perfect triangle shape there was no sound at all the object was flying south/east...Omg is what we both thought as we watched this object flying in the sky and we could not believe what we were seeing. we lost sight of the object behind the neighbors trees.
content.summary: 3 dim lights in triangle shape no sound flying se in the sky. thin see through clouding

content.detailedDescription: Walking home, then something caught my eye. what made me notice the object was the sudden urge to look up. at first i thought it was a star or something but, then after a few seconds realized it wasn't. the object was just hovering in the sky, then there was a flash of light and it disappeared. after it went away i waited a few seconds then ran away.
content.summary: First noticed it hovering in place, then there was a flash and it flew away..

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were heading south on sleeter kinney road in our ford edge. i saw a light that looked exactly like a shooting star except it was going straight down like a streak but it looped or curved to the left then down, in the far distance, disappeared in seconds, was not a flare or lantern, i think it was a meteor, but it didnt fall in an arc. 
i turned off the radio and exclaimed" a shooting star! no a meteor! i dont know!"

this was at 6:50 in the evening and looked like a shooting star but heading straight down and looping to the left before disappearing in the distance. it was very fast but shooting stars dont go down.
content.summary: Very bright light shooting down looped or spiraled along the way

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my stepson,and i had this feeling to look to the sky.I looked to the nw of the sky,and i told my stepson look those are ufos they were in a check shape with other 3 beside it.They moved around into a diamond shape and disappeared,couple minutes later one showed up rising above the sky towards north slowly and disappeared.There's no way this were flares. flares don't move around into shapes then disappeared.Like moving forward then back,i just went outside and there having fireworks towards where i saw this objects.Its 8:35pm this happen over an hour ago.Are they trying to communicate with us.I don't think fireworks do shapes and disappeared faster than speed of light.This weren't making any sounds.I told my stepson i wished i had a video camera,so people could believe what we saw.I was like amazing!
content.summary: They were in a line,then triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog outside for a pee. i saw an airplane and watched it until it got near the object and then it caught my eye. it was much larger than the airplane or any visible stars in the sky. i thought it was a huge star. it flickered but mostly remained in the same place. i was all like, "whoa" during and after the sighting. it flickered among the treetops but mostly stayed in the same place and i lost sight of it when i walked inside.
content.summary: Much brighter than a star and much larger than one i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription: i was looking at these vacation photos that were taken may 5th 2013 in yosemite park when i noticed these 2 objects in the upper left.  i know they were not contrails that commercial jets cause, because i had other pictures with contrails that don't look anything like this.  the pictures were taken 3 seconds apart.  my camera recorded the time as 3:37:18 pm & the next at 3:37:21 pm, my camera was recording in eastern standard time in the pacific time zone.  these photos are not changed in any way - right out of the camera, taken in raw format and changed to jpeg format for emailing purposes. i noticed the objects about 3 months after they were taken and was curious about them.  i was just on this site for the first time, and noticed some other images you have here that resembled these objects. the pictures also show some darker slightly curved verticle streaks in the sky that are unknown.
content.summary: Just found them in a vacation picture that i had taken at yosemite park

content.detailedDescription:
We live at 7,000' elevation. bright blue sky with puffy white clouds about 2,000 elevation. i have never seen an airliner fly over in the north. saw this silver object fly out of one white cloud into another. i expected to see it fly out of the opposite end���.Instead it flew out where it entered and back into the first cloud. it never appeared again. 

other events���...

i saw one of these 180 turn arounds with the same type of aircraft in 1952 with my dad. he also saw it and said it was a tricky fighter jet developed to fight in the korean war. 

i witnessed the 1966 ufo sighting over downtown l.A. that was featued in the lax tower scene in "close encounters".  several incomming airline pilots, the tower and a bunch of us at usc saw it around 5pm. 

sailed over 3 100' diameter blue green discs on a foggy may night at midnight on the way to catalina island. they were several feet below the surface and lit our boat like a phosphorus shake stick. 5 us were on the boat as witness.
content.summary: Thought it was an airliner until it changed directions 180.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my garden having a cigarette while looking at the stars. i noticed that one of the stars appeared to be moving. i watched it for around a minute or so then it just disappeared? ?
i would class myself as a normal guy however this did slightly freak me out a little.  i do t understand where it went!! 
i guess the direction from me was more south east east, possibly heading to edinburgh.  however as it was too far away its unknown whether this was in the sky or out in space.
was just like a bright white light,  much the same as how a star would look in the night sky, yet it just disappeared? ?
content.summary: Moved like a plane then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on 75 south to cincinnati saw three lights dancing in the sky. pulled into a mcdonalds to view better watched for a minute then they disappeared. asked someone next to me if they saw it they said no. but many people saw them and reported it. there's a video online of the event.  really had an impact on me psychologically. looked just like the ufo tv shows you see.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw three lights dancing in the sky joining seperating rising and falling

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my balcony to smoke a cigarette. my house is high up on a hill, and surrounded by trees. i am facing north west looking above the tree line towards nyc, when i see a bright light. i see other planes flying about, but this light is brighter than the planes. it could be a helicopters search lights i think. i stare at it, but it doesn't move. there is no noise, maybe its a meteor, i think. but again no movement, it is stationary, and the lights are so bright. i have seen meteors before and this doesn't seem like a meteor. i watch it some more, then i run for my cell phone to get a video. i record the bright light, in my phone it seems to be cigar shaped but with the naked eye it seems circular. it also seems to be pulsating. i am skeptical, i think its a star just very low and bright. i look at the other stars in the sky, and this is not a star it is just way to bright. i really don't know what i saw. it remained in the sky for over an hour. i had to go in my house, when i came back a half hour later it was gone. the lights were so bright it appeared to have lines of lights escaping the center all around it, like a star. i was in dumbfounded, never seen this before.  what is it?
content.summary: Extremely bright light, stationary and brighter than the planes passing around, possibly a comet or meteor, brighter than stars in the sky, looked like a huge flood light, illuminated the sky around it with bright white light

content.detailedDescription: At work talking to mechanic..I saw objects last week...So ive bein watching... i beleived the object was a ufo ive seen them before.. different one i personaly have had about 20 sightings..The first object was a basketball sized white ball it just appeared out of the blue skymoved..Around  seaveral different directions then dissappeared...It did this about 4 to 5 times in a 5 minute window...The second object started as a white ball and turned sideways toward the sun you could see the sun reflection on its right side shiny silver color..As it turned further left it turneda medium gun metal grey color ..I saw this object 3 times in a5 to 7 minute window..The 3rd objectwas triangle shaped was grey to medium black in color..Appeared as a whit dot coming straight at me i put up my binoculars and it seemed to stop and was watching me..After 3minutes it got bigger  it was 500feet from tip to tail both side there was a pale round light on the front tip back corners and 1 light between tip and tail on both sides..All three of these objects simple vanished.. the4th object was very dark black.Round saucer shaped simply appeared in the sky it had a very dark red/orange light emmitting around its outer edge.Moved to my right tipped left slowly moved left..At the top of this object was 4/5 spike shaped points protruding from it s top.It simply vanished..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: After last sat..Event.I bein watchingsame..Area and they came back...

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the sky when i observed a meteorite streak across the sky north of my position heading in a easterly direction. a few seconds after this, i watched a bar of soft light (2-3 feet long and approx. 5 inches wide) descend in to the large brazilian pepper bushes directly across from me. this light moved from bush to bush starting from my position directly across the street and moving to the north. the light was bright enough to illuminate an area in the bush for a second or two before moving to the next bush. it did this to about 7-10 bushes, hopping from bush to bush. it did not appear to be fire flies because the initial light was a "bar" of light which did not appear to illuminate the bush. the illumination appeared just before the bar of light winked out. no sound was made. there was no wind. there was no aircraft. i saw no fireflies external to the bushes.

several minutes later, i returned to the front of my house and looked due north of my position and saw one more bar of light about 300-400 feet from my position.
content.summary: Bar of soft light jumped from bush to bush

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country where there are just a very few lights seen in the distant. no close neighbors. the nearest road is half a mile away.

it was a restless night for me and was wide awake, it was about 1am when i ventured out my room to make a bathroom visit. i had to go through the office which was pitch dark and only a few steps from the kitchen so i did not turn on the light. as soon as i entered the office i saw the wall that i was turned towards as i was leaving the room suddenly light up outlining the french windows against it. 

it took only a second to realize that nothing i know of could be making a light come through the window like that, so i quickly turned my head to look behind me to see a huge,glowing white light ascending over the house.

ive been seeing lights around the house since i first moved in going on 13 years now.

this event in itself does not seem so disturbing to me if i had not just recently experienced missing time.

i often have many restless nights. i watch t.V., mostly with the sound turned down, toss and turn, and go the bathroom, which i have to leave the bedroom, go through the office, kitchen and small hall to get to. i am a clock watcher so i check the time periodically through the night, not always but sometimes. on this night, when i left the room i glanced at the time, it was close to midnight. when i got back into the room for some reason i decided to check the time again and it was 3:12am. to me, all i did was go straight to the bathroom and back. it was quite disturbing to me so i told my boyfriend and daughter later that day about the incident. we just laughed it off. not laughing now.
content.summary: Seen bright light coming through window, turned to see light ascending over house
